passing_attempts.sentence: Conny Football went 14-of-28 for 177 yards and a late pick, which was a weak throw while rolling out of the pocket.

passing_completions.sentence: Conny Football went 14-of-28 for 177 yards and a late pick, which was a weak throw while rolling out of the pocket.

passing_yards.sentence: Conny Football went 14-of-28 for 177 yards and a late pick, which was a weak throw while rolling out of the pocket.

1.comment: Shaw. Conny Football opened with a 30-yard pass to Jordan Cameron, but followed that up with a lost a fumble on a botched snap near the red zone. Conny Football went 14-of-28 for 177 yards and a late pick, which was a weak throw while rolling out of the pocket. Shaw handled himself well considering the circumstances, and perhaps showed that he could be a No. 2 quarterback in this league. He just missed out on a touchdown when
